Name: Vampiro
Ingredients: 7 drop Hot pepper sauce (red vinegar-based e.g. Tabasco)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Something of a supercharged Bloody Maria with a hint of sweet grenadine.
History: The national drink of Mexico where it's often made with pomegranate juice in place of tomato juice and without the grenadine.
